Government
==========

9
1
1
2

1. #### [Adopted Ordinances - Uncodified](https://www.sansompark.org/2166/Adopted-Ordinances---Uncodified)

   Here you can view or download ordinances the have been adopted by City Council and will be included in the next supplement of the Code of Ordinances.
2. #### [City Administrator](https://www.sansompark.org/2213/City-Administrator)
3. #### [City Council](https://www.sansompark.org/2147/City-Council)

   Here you can find information on the City Council, such as board members, meeting frequency, and location.
4. #### [City Secretary](https://www.sansompark.org/2212/City-Secretary)
5. #### [Code of Ordinances](https://ecode360.com/SA6474)
6. #### [Departments](https://www.sansompark.org/2149/Departments)

   Learn more about the Animal Control, Economic Development, Employment, Fire Department, Municipal Court, Police, Water or Sewer, Utility Billing, and more.
